messages.subject: learning via play
messages.msgSnippet: me again ... actually I COULD give them a Legos test today, Nance and they d both pass w/ FLYING COLORS!!! I can t believe the Star Wars sort of city my fellas
messages.messageBody:
me again ...

actually I COULD give them a Legos test today, Nance and they'd both pass w/
FLYING COLORS!!!

I can't believe the Star Wars sort of city my fellas built this morning,
it's INCREDIBLE ... *ack*, I don't have the HEART to tell them I NEED to
vacuum!!! nahhhhhhh, I'll save *that* chore for *another* day <G> ...
goodness, I think I just might have a couple of budding architects on my
hands ... hehe, don't the critics of UNschooling argue that dch aren't
*learning* if they aren't sitting @ their little desks filling out
workbooks??? *nooooo*, the critics are WRONG, my dch learn WONDERFUL things
via play ... mannnnnn, I wished ya'll could see those busy little minds just
clicking along as the work w/ the creative juices flowing ... how gratifying
for me to kick
back and watch their adventure, yep, it just does a mama's heart *proud*
<VBCG>

Pris (dss 11/9)
WARNING: I cannot be help responsible for the above, as apparently my cats
have learned how to type ...



----- Original Message -----
From: <marbleface@...>
To: <Unschooling-dotcom@egroups.com>
Sent: Monday, September 04, 2000 12:07 PM
Subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] TX TAAS test


>
> In a message dated 09/04/2000 4:59:20 PM !!!First Boot!!!,
> x_t_sipr@... writes:
>
> <<
> hehe, actually my boys showed me about the Family Circus comic yesterday
...
> the comic kids were so excited about getting on the schoolbus and one of
my
> boys said "HA, I wonder if they'll be as excited on the 2nd day of
> school!!!" haha ...
>
> **Sharp kid!
>
> I love your story about your kidlets helping each, what
> nice children you have :)
>
> **They were nice yesterday too!! I wonder what's up!!??
>
>
> mine have been sprawled out on the den floor for
> hours playing w/ legos ... soooooo many legos, so little time, lol ...
~>
> shoot, I think I'll go join~em :)
>
> Pris >>
>
> **Notice: There will not be a test!
>
> Nance
>
